name: Le journal interactif 94 et le jeu des stars de l'info
overview: Le journal interactif 94 et Le jeu des stars de l'info is a collection of newsreels from the French broadcast company TF1. In this multimedia title you can review all the news subject of 1994. You can also create your own news show using footage from the same year. The goal is to to impress the chief editor.
